title: Keep getting an error when I try to install the game
body:
So I've just downloaded the installer and as soon as i click run it comes up with an error saying "Invalid Drive: E:\".
I've made sure I've downloaded the correct installer and i've checked everywhere but i can't even find anyone with the same issue let alone a solution.
Any input is appreciated.

replies.body:
It sounds like your installer may be trying to configure to the wrong installation directory. When going through the installer, ensure it lists the directory below as the installation location

> **C:\Riot Games\League of Legends**

If you still have issues installing, let me know.
